snippet: Georgia’s richest man, Bidzina Ivanishvili, announced his opposition to the president in October, and the government’s subsequent revocation of his citizenship was upheld this week.
abstract: Government of Georgia revokes citizenship of reclusive philanthropist Bidzina Ivanishvili, country's richest man, months after he announced his opposition to President Mikheil Saakashvili; Ivanishvili is barred from running for office or financing parties ahead of country's parliamentary elections in October 2012.
lead_paragraph: Georgia’s richest man, Bidzina Ivanishvili, announced his opposition to the president in October, and the government’s subsequent revocation of his citizenship was upheld this week.

headline.seo: Jump to Politics Turns Georgian Billionaire Into Public Enemy No. 1
headline.main: From Philanthropist to Public Enemy in Georgia
headline.print_headline: From Philanthropist to Public Enemy in Georgia
